thread.title: Denise
thread.title_full: Rubber Stamp Champ reviewed by Denise

author: Denise
title: Denise
text: I had a very unhelpful customer service representative named Brittany. She made made it clear she was annoyed with or not interested in my questions. I was trying to decide the best stamp product for my company's needs and she was very short with her answers and added rude comments. I will definitely be taking my business elsewhere.
